General.Name: ShinyBud Corp
General.Description: Shiny Health & Wellness Corp. operates as a cannabis and pharmacy retailer in Canada. It sells cannabis and accessories, as well as pharmaceutical products and services. The company was formerly known as ShinyBud Corp. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 150 York Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3S5

1.Title: CFO, Chief Information Officer & Corp. Sec.
